content: Please make it so we can type in a start value for the bruteforcer, the slider even if you do 1 tick at a time will go up by 1000's on a big combo ðŸ˜‚
<@455935652207263744> i think this is for you
You can click on the sides of the slider to make it go +1/-1
Keep the mouse click down to do it quickly
